allow:
Bash(bash -c '
ME=$(gh api user --jq "".login"")
gh pr view 44174 --json number,title,reviewDecision,reviewRequests,comments,reviews | jq --arg me ""$ME"" ""{
  pr: .number,
  title: .title,
  reviewDecision: .reviewDecision,
  pendingReviewers: [.reviewRequests[] | if .name then .name else .login end],
  comments: [.comments[] | select((.author.login == \""agent-platform-auto-pr\"" or .author.login == \""cit-pr-commenter\"" or .author.login == \""datadog-official\"" or .author.login == \""dd-octo-sts\"" or .author.login == \$me or (.author.login | startswith(\""graphite\""))) | not) | select((.body | test(\""Go Package Import Differences|Static quality checks|GitLab CI Configuration Changes|Regression Detector|bits_ai_status|graphite.dev\""; \""i\"")) | not) | {author: .author.login, body: .body[0:200]}],
  reviews: [.reviews[] | select(.state == \""CHANGES_REQUESTED\"" or .state == \""APPROVED\"" or (.body | length > 0)) | select((.author.login == \""agent-platform-auto-pr\"" or .author.login == \$me) | not) | {author: .author.login, state: .state, body: .body[0:200]}]
}""
')
